application_details.lead_developer_company_name: LBRuT Non-Comm Env Health Noise Issues

decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt the documents to which this decision refers are as follows:-
•	Soft Landscape Management and Maintenance Plan
•	Noise Management Plan
•	Travel Plan
•	Proposed Hard Landscaping Plan (641.03.03.Pln04.080)
•	Proposed Access & Enclosure (1641.03.03.Pln03.081)
•	Proposed Minor Artifacts & Structures (1641.03.03.Pln03.082)
•	Proposed Soft Landscaping (1641.03.03.Pln03.083)
•	Proposed Soft Landscape Details (1641.03.03.Pln03.085)
•	Prop. Refuse/Cycle/Scooter & Buggy Store (1641.03.03.Pln03.084)
Received on 30 Apr 2025
description:
APPROVE
Details pursuant to conditions; U0184955 - Noise Management Plan, U0184963 - Cycle/Scooter/Buggy Parking and U0184970 - Hard and Soft Landscaping Required of planning approval 24/1277/VRC.
REFUSE
Details pursuant to conditions U0184964 - Travel Plan of planning approval 24/1277/VRC.
